title: Hextech Crafting - Unable to access/causes disconnection.
body:
Every time I attempt to access my Hextech crafting, it does the "loading" screen for about 30 seconds or so (sometimes longer), then disconnects me from the client. If I attempt to stop accessing Hextech crafting and go somewhere else I am unable to, and once I've attempted to access Hextech crafting (and been told it's unable to access it) I am unable to join games/queues, or access anything, and have to completely close down my client and relog in. 

However, as long as I don't attempt to go to the Hextech Crafting menu, I am 100% fine. Able to shop, make summoner changes, play all games. But Hextech Crafting is completely inaccessible, and has been for quite some time.

I've read through the FAQ's and stickied discussions and nothing in those gives me any overview about if this is an ongoing problem, or any potential solutions to this issue. I'd really appreciate some assistance.

replies.body: I have more than enough chests and key frags, but when I try to forge a key or open a chest, nothing happens. Even after right click > forge key > nothing. No screen animation of making a key, no options, nothing happens. Everything else is also stuck, I can't upgrade my champion mastery, I can't reroll skin / select any options to do so.

Just tried to access it again today, still having the same issue as described, and I'd really like a solution. Yes I know it's an additional thing recently added for free, but it's a bit silly then getting a pop up saying "you've got a chest or key fragment earned" and that part of the game is completely inaccessible.
